attributes.action: Save Our Towns ,Bring Back Our High Streets and Restore Pride in Our Communities
attributes.additional_details: We’re calling on the Government to support struggling towns with fairer business rates, rent relief for small shops, and funding to tackle homelessness and drug use through proper outreach and support services. Town centres need targeted investment in safety, regeneration, and community spaces. We want real action to bring back pride, safety, and life to our high streets.
attributes.background: High streets are becoming ghost towns. We’re asking the Government to back small businesses, fund local outreach for rough sleepers and addiction, and invest in town safety. Communities deserve better cleaner streets, safer spaces, and support to thrive, not just survive.

rejection.details:
The following petitions cover these issues: 

Review high street regeneration & local community empowerment
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/731894

Launch a public inquiry into business rates and small businesses 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/726726

Change business rates relief for 25/26 back to 75%. 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/722220
